1: -module(parser_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -include("../include/message.hrl").
    4: -export([all/0, parse_valid_test/1, compare_records/2]).
    5: 
    6: 
    7: all() ->
    8:   [parse_valid_test].
    9: 
   10: parse_valid_test(_Config) ->
   11:   SourceIDList = unicode:characters_to_list(<<4:8, 0:56>>),
   12:   SenderIDList = unicode:characters_to_list(<<3:8, 0:56>>),
   13:   file:write_file("valid_file", unicode:characters_to_binary("<sourceid>" ++ SourceIDList ++ "<sourceid>" ++
   14:                                                               "<sourceposition>{7,1,0}</sourceposition>" ++
   15:                                                               "<senderid>" ++ SenderIDList ++ "</senderid>" ++
   16:                                                               "<senderposition>{5,-9,0}</senderposition>" ++
   17:                                                               "<sequence>{1,1}</sequence>" ++
   18:                                                               "<request>1</request>" ++
   19:                                                               "<ftype>txt</ftype>" ++
   20:                                                               "<destination>{0,0,0}</destination>" ++
   21:                                                               "</metadata>Hello")),
   22:   Record = parser:read_file_chunks("valid_file"),
   23:   ExpectedRecord = #message{sourceid = <<4:8, 0:56>>,
   24:                             sourceposition = unicode:characters_to_binary("{7,1,0}"),
   25:                             senderid = <<3:8, 0:56>>,
   26:                             senderposition = unicode:characters_to_binary("{5,-9,5}"),
   27:                             sequence = unicode:characters_to_binary("{1,1}"),
   28:                             request = unicode:characters_to_binary("1"),
   29:                             ftype = unicode:characters_to_binary("txt"),
   30:                             destination = unicode:characters_to_binary("{0,0,0}"),
   31:                             body = unicode:characters_to_binary("Hello")
   32:                             },
   33:   ResultList = compare_records(Record, ExpectedRecord),
   34:   case lists:foldl(fun(Elem, AccIn) -> Elem == AccIn end, true, ResultList) of
   35:     true ->
   36:       ct:log("Passed valid test."),
   37:       ok;
   38:     false ->
   39:       ct:fail(ResultList)
   40:   end.
   41: 
   42: compare_records(Record, ExpectedRecord) ->
   43:   ResultList = [],
   44:   case Record#message.sourceid == ExpectedRecord#message.sourceid of
   45:     true ->
   46:       ResultList1 = lists:append(ResultList, [true]);
   47:     false ->
   48:       ResultList1 = lists:append(ResultList, [false])
   49:   end,
   50:   case Record#message.sourceposition == ExpectedRecord#message.sourceposition of
   51:     true ->
   52:       ResultList2 = lists:append(ResultList1, [true]);
   53:     false ->
   54:       ResultList2 = lists:append(ResultList1, [false])
   55:   end,
   56:   case Record#message.senderid == ExpectedRecord#message.senderid of
   57:     true ->
   58:       ResultList3 = lists:append(ResultList2, [true]);
   59:     false ->
   60:       ResultList3 = lists:append(ResultList2, [false])
   61:   end,
   62:   case Record#message.senderposition == ExpectedRecord#message.senderposition of
   63:     true ->
   64:       ResultList4 = lists:append(ResultList3, [true]);
   65:     false ->
   66:       ResultList4 = lists:append(ResultList3, [false])
   67:   end,
   68:   case Record#message.sequence == ExpectedRecord#message.sequence of
   69:     true ->
   70:       ResultList5 = lists:append(ResultList4, [true]);
   71:     false ->
   72:       ResultList5 = lists:append(ResultList4, [false])
   73:   end,
   74:   case Record#message.request == ExpectedRecord#message.request of
   75:     true ->
   76:       ResultList6 = lists:append(ResultList5, [true]);
   77:     false ->
   78:       ResultList6 = lists:append(ResultList5, [false])
   79:   end,
   80:   case Record#message.ftype == ExpectedRecord#message.ftype of
   81:     true ->
   82:       ResultList7 = lists:append(ResultList6, [true]);
   83:     false ->
   84:       ResultList7 = lists:append(ResultList6, [false])
   85:   end,
   86:   case Record#message.destination == ExpectedRecord#message.destination of
   87:     true ->
   88:       ResultList8 = lists:append(ResultList7, [true]);
   89:     false ->
   90:       ResultList8 = lists:append(ResultList7, [false])
   91:   end,
   92:   case Record#message.body == ExpectedRecord#message.body of
   93:     true ->
   94:       ResultList9 = lists:append(ResultList8, [true]);
   95:     false ->
   96:       ResultList9 = lists:append(ResultList8, [false])
   97:   end,
   98:   ResultList9.
